Class AbstractTorsion

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractTorsion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Immutable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomTorsion, IndexTorsion, ProtoTorsion

    public abstract class AbstractTorsion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Immutable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a torsion angle.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getDihedralAngle

        public abstract double getDihedralAngle()
        Returns the torsion angle in degrees. Atoms are explicitly defined already.
        Returns:
        the angle in degrees

      • getDihedralAngle

        public abstract double getDihedralAngle(Molecule molecule)
        Returns the torsion angle in degrees. Atoms are implicitly defined by atom number, so a Molecule must be provided.
        Parameters:
        molecule - the Molecule associated with this torsion angle
        Returns:
        the angle in degrees

      • getDihedralAngle

        public static double getDihedralAngle(Vector3D vector1,
                      Vector3D vector2,
                      Vector3D vector3,
                      Vector3D vector4)
        Returns the corresponding vector2-vector3 dihedral angle in degrees.
        Parameters:
        vector1 - position of atom1
        vector2 - position of atom2
        vector3 - position of atom3
        vector4 - position of atom4
        Returns:
        the dihedral angle in degrees
